Author: catsinsunglassess
Text: I feel this. A lot. I have recently felt very out of control with my eating, and I’m eating things i used to be afraid of. I am maintaining my weight. But even knowing that I’m eating previously “unsafe” foods i look in the mirror and i swear my face is fatter. I have gained weight everywhere. I feel disgusting. But? My clothes still fit? I’m still the same weight? It’s all perception- an absolute mind fuck. I only feel skinny when I’m in complete control and eating the “right” foods. I went vegan to control my eating disorder even more but it has completely backfired. Previously unsafe foods are now safe.. i hate it. I’m thinking about quitting being vegan because i can’t restrict well enough. That makes me... feel some sort of way...
